name: Cave Guy
description:
Goal: Collect all four keys to summon the rock boss, then fight through all of the boss's phases and go through the door as fast as possible.

Controls:

  • Movement: [Arrow keys] or [WASD]
  • Jump: [Space]
  • Attack: [Ctrl]
  • Interact: [E]
  • Ladder Movement: [Up/Down] or [W/S]
  • Drop Down: [Down + Space] or [S + Space]
  • Exit Game: [ESC]

Note: you can't go down ladders from above

Game made by: Joey Southerland
